sys_security_acl.description: Deny write for records in x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case, unless users have the role x_1837836_hr_cas_1.hr_case_user, and the ACL condition (stat0=closed^ORstat0=cancelled^EQ) evaluates to true.

sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><applies_to/><condition table="x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case">stat0=closed^ORstat0=cancelled^EQ<item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="stat0" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="closed"/><item display_value="Cancelled" endquery="false" field="stat0" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="cancelled"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>deny</decision_type><description>Deny write for records in x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case, unless users have the role x_1837836_hr_cas_1.hr_case_user, and the ACL condition (stat0=closed^ORstat0=cancelled^EQ) evaluates to true.</description><local_or_existing>Existing</local_or_existing><name>x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script/><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-01 17:44:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>6fa80cb54725b610d1321af2e16d439c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case</sys_name><sys_package display_value="HR Case Management" source="x_1837836_hr_cas_1">e4f06aa147e57610d1321af2e16d4311</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HR Case Management">e4f06aa147e57610d1321af2e16d4311</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_6fa80cb54725b610d1321af2e16d439c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-01 17:57:13</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
